resources.string: You will lose previously achieved rank and medals.\n\nContinue?
Welcome to unofficial World of Warcraft Quiz, the Epic Wow Quiz!

You can test your Warcraft knowledge by playing Easy, Medium or Hard tier.\n\nEach tier contains ten, randomly generated, questions. Depending on your score, you can be awarded with Bronze, Silver or Gold medal.
Your rank and title depends on medals you managed to obtain.
There is a rumor that something special can happen if you manage to master the quiz by getting the Gold medal in all three tiers... Good luck!

Disclaimer:
Epic WoW quiz is not a product made by Blizzard Entertainment. It is unofficial game related to the Warcraft universe. Used graphic assets are property of Blizzard Entertainment.
